products.title: Off Shoulder Blue Skater Dress
products.description: Features an elastic off-the-shoulder neckline, short sleeve, a slim fitting bodice and a super cute skater skirt with a hi-low hem.

products.title: Emerald Velvet Block Heel Mary Janes
products.description: An ever-charming emerald pair by Restricted, these covered-buckle block heels bring velvet vim to every outfit with which they're worn.
